page.title: 10THE NAGS HEAD - URCHFONT
page.content: THE NAGS HEAD LOCATED NEAR THE GREEN AND VILLAGE POND IS A FREE HOUSE RUN BY TWO FAMILYS AND IS USED BY LOCAL PEOPLE, BUT ALSO HAS A PASSING TRADE DURING THE SUMMER OF PEOPLE FROM A CARAVAN SITE NEAR BY, TOURISTS DRIVING THROUGH AND BUISNESSMEN. THERE ARE MIXED DARTS TEAMS ENTERED IN THE DARTS LEAGUE, TWO BAR BILLIARDS TEAMS AND TWO POOL TEAMS, ALL PLAYING AGAINST OTHER PUBS IN THE AREA. THE NAGS HEAD HAS A LARGE LOUNGE, BAR WITH COMFORTABLE CHAIRS AND DARK WOOD TABLES WITH A HUGE FIRE PLACE WHERE A LOG FIRE BURNS THROUGHOUT THE COLDER MONTHS OF THE YEAR. HERE, BAR SNACKS OF FULL MEALS ARE BEAUTIFULLY COOKED AND SERVED AT LUNCH TIMES AND EVENINGS. FLOWER ARRANGMENTS BRIGHTEN CORNERS AND THE HOST AND HOSTESS WELCOME THEIR CUSTOMERS.
